column4: hello my external speakers and my microphone do not work on this ubuntu laptop.  can anyone help?
anyone know how to troubleshoot mic problems?
sudo - s
hello?
I'm trying to skype but the mic isn't working...
the mic is not muted
does it work in other apps?
sound recorder is in a default ubuntu install
what is the output of: wget -O alsa-info.sh http://alsa-project.org/alsa-info.sh && bash ./alsa-info.sh
run it and a URL will be generated, what is the URL?
give me chance, geez
is it an EEEPC 1000
or does it have a letter on the end?
ok let me search
add:          options snd-hda-intel model=fujitsu           to            /etc/modprobe.d/alsa-base.conf
may help
you currently have it set as generic
also run:   alsamixer     be sure all levels are umuted and maxed
http://wiki.debian.org/DebianEeePC/HowTo/Sound#Model_900A.2C_901.2C_1000.2C_1000H.2C_and_1000HE_front_Microphone
what is the output of: wget -O alsa-info.sh http://alsa-project.org/alsa-info.sh && bash ./alsa-info.sh
run the command and upload to the server, it will make a URL, what is the URL?
you don't have an Alsa driver version
sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get -y --reinstall install alsa-base alsa-utils; killall pulseaudio; rm -r ~/.pulse*         may help
